languages.text: Пучки проводов вырваны из шеи сервитора, а поврежденные сочленения сочатся желтоватой жидкостью. Насколько нужно было разозлиться, чтобы сотворить подобное?

traits.locale_text: Пучки проводов вырваны из шеи сервитора, а поврежденные сочленения сочатся желтоватой жидкостью. Насколько нужно было разозлиться, чтобы сотворить подобное?

languages.text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?
languages.original_text: Пучки проводов вырваны из шеи сервитора, а поврежденные сочленения сочатся желтоватой жидкостью. Насколько нужно было разозлиться, чтобы сотворить подобное?

traits.locale_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?
Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?
Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?
Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

languages.text: 成捆的电线被人从这个机仆的脖子上扯了下来，某种黄色的液体正从受损的关节处渗出。人究竟得气急败坏到什么份上，才会做出这种事情？
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: 成捆的电线被人从这个奴工的脖子上扯了下来，某种黄色的液体正从受损的关节处渗出。人究竟得气急败坏到什么份上，才会做出这种事情？

languages.text: Han arrancado un montón de cables del cuello del servidor y sus articulaciones dañadas rezuman un fluido amarillo. ¿Cómo de enfadada tiene que estar una persona para hacer algo así?
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: Han arrancado un montón de cables del cuello del servidor y sus articulaciones dañadas rezuman un fluido amarillo. ¿Cómo de enfadada tiene que estar una persona para hacer algo así?

languages.text: サーヴィターの首からケーブルの束が引き抜かれ、その損傷した関節からは黄色い液体が垂れている。こんな状態にした者は、どれほどの怒りを抱えていたのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターの首からケーブルの束が引き抜かれ、その損傷した関節からは黄色い液体が垂れている。こんな状態にした者は、どれほどの怒りを抱えていたのだろうか？

languages.text: Des faisceaux entiers de câbles ont été arrachés du cou du servitor et un fluide jaunâtre suinte de ses articulations malmenées. Quelqu'un devait être dans une colère noire pour occasionner pareils dégâts.
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: Des faisceaux entiers de câbles ont été arrachés du cou du servitor et un fluide jaunâtre suinte de ses articulations malmenées. Quelqu'un devait être dans une colère noire pour occasionner pareils dégâts.

languages.text: Kabelstränge wurden aus dem Hals des Servitors gerissen, und aus den beschädigten Gelenken quillt eine gelbe Flüssigkeit. Wie wütend muss jemand sein, um so etwas zu tun?
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: Kabelstränge wurden aus dem Hals des Servitors gerissen, und aus den beschädigten Gelenken quillt eine gelbe Flüssigkeit. Wie wütend muss jemand sein, um so etwas zu tun?

languages.text: Bu hizmetörün boynundaki kablolar yığınla sökülmüş, ayrıca hizmetörün hasarlı eklemlerinden sarı renkli bir sıvı sızıyor. Bir insan neye kızmış olabilir ki böyle bir şey yapsın?
languages.original_text: Bundles of wires have been ripped out of the servitor's neck and a yellow fluid is seeping from its damaged joints. How angry would a person have to be to do this?

traits.locale_text: Bu servitörün boynundaki kablolar yığınla sökülmüş ve servitörün hasarlı eklemlerinden de sarı renkli bir sıvı sızıyor. Bir insanın bunu yapması için ne kadar kızgın olması gerekir?
